name: KeyRacer
alternateName: KeyRacer - The Ultimate Keyboard Racing Championship
description: KeyRacer is a comprehensive skill development platform combining typing practice, coding challenges, and professional communication skills training. Improve your typing speed, learn programming through interactive exercises, and enhance your professional skills.

mainEntity.name: KeyRacer Typing Test
mainEntity.description: Improve your typing speed and accuracy with KeyRacer's advanced typing test featuring real-time analytics and adaptive difficulty levels.

mainEntity.name: CodeRacer
mainEntity.description: Learn programming through interactive typing exercises in multiple languages including Python, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Java, and C++.

mainEntity.name: Professional Skills Lab
mainEntity.description: Enhance your professional communication skills with templates and practice for resumes, cover letters, business emails, and more.
